snippet: Defense Minister Ehud Barak instructed the military on Tuesday to start drafting ultra-Orthodox Jewish men as it does other Israelis, an issue that has divided the country for decades.
abstract: Israeli Defense Min Ehud Barak instructs the military to start drafting ultra-Orthodox Jewish men as it does other Israelis, setting up a potential clash over an issue that has divided the country for decades
lead_paragraph: Defense Minister Ehud Barak instructed the military on Tuesday to start drafting ultra-Orthodox Jewish men as it does other Israelis, an issue that has divided the country for decades.

headline.main: Israel: Military Ordered to Develop Plan to Draft Ultra-Orthodox Men
headline.print_headline: Israel: Military Ordered to Develop Plan to Draft Ultra-Orthodox Men
